description:
Vrlitwhai appeared in the movie http://anidb.net/a996 [The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?] as a Zentradi commander who also becomes a defector to the human side. However, he appeared bald with a modified uniform and face plate, and his name was changed to Vrlitwhai 7018 in the film credits.
Source: wiki
name: Vrlitwhai 7018
